name: skill-creator
title: Skill Creator
description: Create, scaffold, validate, and package Claude Code skills and SKILL.md/spec files. Use when building skill folders, tuning triggers, or packaging .skill files. Not for app features or incidents.
goals: Provide a repeatable workflow for authoring Skills with clear triggers and validation
Ensure skills are packaged as .skill files after validation and security checks
Promote composable, token-efficient skills with explicit inputs and verification
non_goals: Generate application code unrelated to Skills
Assume external dependencies without listing them
Debug production incidents unrelated to skills
inputs: Target directory for the skill folder
Required inputs, success criteria, and verification commands
outputs: Optional supporting files (scripts/, references/, assets/, tests/)

integration.notes: Use local scripts and validation; avoid external systems unless required.

triggers: Create a new Claude Code skill for my project
How do I create a skill in Claude Code?
Validate and package this skill folder
Review my skill spec and triggers
Package this skill as a .skill file
anti_triggers: Implement a React dashboard for analytics
Investigate a 500 error in a live API
Optimize a SQL query for latency
acceptance_tests: Given a skill idea and 2-3 example requests, produce a scaffolded skill folder where SKILL.md frontmatter parses and includes name/description, and skill.spec.json includes triggers, anti_triggers, and acceptance_tests
Given an existing skill folder with errors, validation reports specific issues (missing fields, invalid name, or spec errors)
Given triggers and a description, trigger analysis reports overlaps or weak matches and suggests missing terms
Given a valid skill folder, packaging produces a .skill file and reports its path
